trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.TriggerAction"></xref> enumeration is used by the <xref href="Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlTriggerContext"></xref> class to indicate what action fired the trigger.
The <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.TriggerAction> enumeration is used by the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlTriggerContext> class to indicate what action fired the trigger.
For more information, see the Transact-SQL Reference of SQL Server Books Online.
An ALTER APPLICATION ROLE Transact-SQL statement was executed.
An ALTER ASSEMBLY Transact-SQL statement was executed.
